column8:
Hayato 
Yuki 
Ōshiro Mugen
Takuma 
Aiko 
Kuma
Shogun
Ryūnosuke
Yabu
Okkoto
Noboru
Masaru
column10:
1) General Okkoto has successfully taken Kanazawa castle.
2) The team regroup at Noboru's warcamp. Information is exchanged.
3) Hayato and Aiko report that Okkoto has set up command in the castle
4) Mugen wants Aiko to wait out the battle in safety
5) Aiko realizes that Yuki saved her husbands live and apologizes to her.
At Noboru's warcamp.
EN
column12: Simplified Chinese

column10: The following day
column12: 第二天

column10: They pushed back our first assaults. We must attack the castle in full force, leave them no time to breathe.
column12: 他们刚挡住我军的首轮进攻。此时更应一鼓作气，全力攻城。不能给敌人喘息的机会。

column10: They fortified themselves within Kanazawa Castle. I will not let them rest on this victory. Our next move must end this rebellion and stop Okkoto once and for all.
column12: 他们龟缩在金泽城内增强了防御。第一轮虽然没打进去，但我不会让他们得意太久。下一轮进攻必须要了结这场叛乱，彻底铲除乙事。

column10: I will not see the use of cannons before I have news of Aiko and Hayato!
column12: 在收到爱子和隼人的消息之前，我是绝不会用火炮的！

column10: With respect, Noboru-sama, but we should wait until we have news of Aiko and Hayato before we march into battle.
column12: 恕属下直言，昇大人。在进军之前，应先等待爱子和隼人的情报。

column10: Mind your place, Mugen. Had we heard of this attack earlier, we would not see battle today.
column12: 注意你的身份，无限！如能早些收到敌方攻城的消息，今日本无需一战。

column10: A matter I find quite puzzling myself. Why was general Okkoto allowed to take Kanazawa castle?
column12: 简直是不可思议。为何金泽城还是被乙事大将攻下来了？

column10: Aiko-san! And Hayato-san!
column12: 爱子小姐！隼人兄！

column10: In the flesh.
column12: 活着回来了。

column10: We learned of Okkoto's plans in Hida village? Did the child not deliver our message?
column12: 我们早已在飞騨村打探到乙事的计划。难道友希没把消息带到？

column10: Er ...
column12: 呃……那个……

column10: Yuki-chan.
column12: 友希小妹。

column10: I told you how important this was, did I not?
column12: 我应该告诉过你此事的重要性吧？

column10: Calm yourself, Aiko-san. Yuki-chan is not at fault.
column12: 冷静点，爱子小姐。不是友希姑娘的错。

column10: Aiko-san. She strayed from her task so she could save my life.
column12: 友希小妹半途发现我们身陷险境，她是为了救我们才不得已脱离任务的。

column10: None of this matters now! We must make do with what we have. What can you both tell us of Okkoto's defences?
column12: 现在说这些也没用！关键是要利用好手头的资源。你俩刺探乙事的城防有什么发现？

column10: We followed him and his army from Hida. They are trained, well equipped and disciplined in combat. Taking the castle came easy to them.
column12: 从飞騨开始我们便一路跟踪他的部队。他们训练有素，装备精良，纪律严明。攻城对他们而言确实轻而易举。

column10: Their food and munition depots are full. They could hold out for months. And we have heard talk that Kage-sama will send reinforcements soon.
column12: 粮草和弹药也储备充足，足够坚守几个月。而且听说影大人很快就会派来援兵。

column10: I will not wait months. Make your preparations! You will all be part of the next attack. I expect you to tip the balance in our favour.
column12: 几个月我可等不了。你们快去做好准备，参加下次进攻。我期望你们能为我军扭转战局。

column10: Lord Noboru! I have precise knowledge of Okkoto's defences. Perhaps it will help you in the battle to come?
column12: 昇大人！我已对乙事的防御布阵了若指掌，或许能为制定下次的战术尽绵薄之力？

column10: If your knowledge is as vital as you make it out to be, Aiko-san, then join us. The rest of you prepare for battle. You will receive my orders shortly.
column12: 如果你掌握的情报真的能克敌制胜，那你就留在后方吧，爱子小姐。其余人，做好战斗准备。我即刻下令。

column10: As you command, Lord Noboru.
column12: 属下遵命，昇大人。

column10: Tch, a woman a the strategy table. Ridiculous …
column12: 哼，让女人出谋划策？简直荒谬……

column9: moves away from Noboru with team
column10: All of you, a word.
column12: 大家过来，我有一言。

column9: Aiko follows Noboru and Masaru, the rest walk away from the tent.

column10: So, behind enemy lines again?
column12: 看来又要深入敌后了？

column10: It seems that way.
column12: 很有可能。

column10: Hehe, feels like old times already.
column12: 哈哈哈，就和当年一样。

column10: Won't Aiko-san be with us?
column12: 爱子姐不和我们一起吗？

column10: She will help us in her own way, advising Lord Noboru. The battle ahead will be very dangerous. You do not have to come, if you don't want to.
column12: 她会为昇大人提供谏言，也是在帮助我们。下场战斗将会非常危险，友希小妹你就不要参加了。

column10: No, I want to help. I was born there. Kanazawa, I mean. I know all the back alleys.
column12: 不，我也要去。因为，我就是在金泽城出生的，城里的大街小巷我都熟门熟路。

column10: If it is your wish, I will not deny you. Let us prepare then and wait for Lord Noboru's instructions.
column12: 如果你真这么想去，我不会拒绝。那就开始准备吧，等候昇大人的命令。

column9: Everybode moves out, only Yuki is stopped by Aiko

column10: Yuki-chan!
column12: 友希小妹!

column10: Aiko-san. I … I'm sorry …
column12: 爱子姐。那个…对不起……

column10: There is no need, Yuki-chan.
column12: 没关系的，友希小妹。

column10: I was on my way, but then I met Kuma, and there was blood …
column12: 那个...我半路遇到了小熊，它身上还有血，所以……

column10: You faced a hard decision. I know I would have done the same.
column12: 确实是很艰难的抉择。如果是我，也会做出同样的选择。

column10: You are no child, Yuki-chan. I doubted you, and for that, I must apologize.
column12: 你已经是出色的大人了，友希小妹。我之前还错怪你了，必须向你道歉。

column10: Aiko-san  …
column12: 爱子姐……

column10: Please, return safely. All of you.
column12: 你们大家，一定要平安归来。

column10: Hai, Aiko-san!
column12: 好，爱子姐！
NINJA

column10: MISSION-WORDCOUNT EN:
